activities: Data2Logistics receives in the course of business personal information from our European based clients and from our European employees. The information may be Personal Data such as job title, workplace location, office telephone number and/or e-mail address or a data subject’s home contact information, e.g., home address, home e-mail address, and home telephone number. Personal information can only be disclosed for General Business Purposes to authorized personnel within Data2Logistics and to Processors who are authorized to access and/or use such Data2Logistics personal information on behalf of a Data2Logistics business unit
eucountries: Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Covered personal data includes organization and client data including manually processed data
privacyprograms: Data2Logistics utilizes TRUSTe for support with our Safe Harbor program
recoursemech: Any privacy concerns or complaints would first be directed to www.privacy@data2logistics.com. If any complaints were to remain unresolved, concerned parties could then escalate their complaint to TRUSTe by Internet at http://www.truste.org/consumers/watchdog_complaint.php, by mail at WatchDog Complaints, TRUSTe, 55 Second Street, 2nd Floor, San Francisco, CA, USA 94105, by phone at 415-520-3400, or by fax at 415-520-3420.
